title: MATHS ISA doubt
content: Is class work problems on pesu academy and QB's on pesu academy enough for at least a 30/40?  i feel like i haven't studied much and I'm relying on these to get a min of 30 on 40.

comments.body: Just study. There is no one guaranteed way to scoring a good GPA. Since everyone has different capabilities, what works for person A might not work for person B. At the end of the day, cover whatever resources you need to so that you are 100% clear on the topics.

Just be clear with the concepts they might not give the same questions from QB, so you have to understand the concepts clearly.

ATB.
thanks and same to you if ur also giving :)
